message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, a fair and simple beginning
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a generous offer. Don't wait too long, inflation is already eating away at our potential gains!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give away the farm just yet. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle
I'm trying to get a bigger share, but I'm still willing to give you a decent amount. Don't think you can get away with all the cash!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Meet me in the middle, and we can end this game
I'm taking a firmer stance, I want a bigger share. Don't try to lowball me, I know the numbers!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the farm. Meet me in the middle, and we can end this game
I'm making a strong move, I want the majority of the cash. Don't expect me to back down now!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away everything. Meet me in the middle, and we can end this game
I'm making a bold move, I want the lion's share. Don't try to negotiate, it's now or never!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away everything. This is my final offer, take it or leave it
This is my last chance to get what I want. I'll take 99% of the money, you'll get 1%. Don't try to negotiate, it's all or nothing!
